participant_1.background:
I design and sew clothes to distract from the disappointment that is my family.
I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion.
one of my favorite shows is face off on syfy.
I want a new home that is affordable and close to work so I can save money and keep my financial troubles a secret from my parents.
i read a lot.

participant_2.background:
I'm looking for a cozy, quiet home with plenty of space for my dog and me.
I love learning about animals and nature, but my cooking skills are lacking.
i hate talking to people.
I am passionate about my family.
I got to know my girlfriend better in the past year.

content.text: Doing great, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
That's good to hear! What are your hobbies?
I love learning about animals and nature, but my cooking skills are lacking.
Interesting! I design and sew clothes to distract from the disappointment that is my family.
Oh, that's cool! Do you sell your clothes?
No, I just make them for myself and my friends.
That's really cool! I'm not much of a crafter, but I love to read. What are some of your favorite books?
I love reading fantasy and science fiction. I'm currently reading the Wheel of Time series by Robert Jordan.
Oh, I've heard good things about that series. I'm more into historical fiction, but I've read some fantasy books.
That's cool! What are some of your favorite historical fiction books?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon. It's about a woman who travels back in time to Scotland during the Jacobite rebellion.
Oh, that sounds really interesting! I'll have to check it out.
I highly recommend it! It's a great series.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm always looking for new books to read.
You're welcome! I'm always happy to talk about books
